item.title: Melissa add a quote by E.L. James
item.description: "- "Why don't you like to be touched?" - "Because I'm fifty shades of fucked-up, Anastasia" -- E.L. James

item.title: Melissa add a quote by E.L. James
item.description: "Laters, baby." -- E.L. James

item.title: Melissa add a quote by E.L. James
item.description: "Sometimes I wonder if there's something wrong with me. Perhaps I've spent too long in the company of my literary romantic heroes, and consequently my ideals and expectations are far too high." -- E.L. James

item.title: Melissa add a quote by E.L. James
item.description: "You have to kiss a lot of frogs before you find your prince" -- E.L. James

item.title: Melissa add a quote by E.L. James
item.description: "His head turns fractionally toward me, his eyes darkest slate. I bite my lip. “Oh, fuck the paperwork,” he growls. He lunges at me, pushing me against the wall of the elevator. Before I know it, he’s got both of my hands in one of his in a vice-like grip above my head, and he’s pinning me to the wall using his hips. Holy shit. His other hand grabs my ponytail and yanks down, bringing my face up, and his lips are on mine. It’s only just not painful. I moan into his mouth, giving his tongue an opening. He takes full advantage, his tongue expertly exploring my mouth. I have never been kissed like this." -- E.L. James

item.title: Melissa add a quote by E.L. James
item.description: "We aim to please Miss Steele" -- E.L. James

item.title: Melissa add a quote by E.L. James
item.description: "He's naked except for those soft ripped jeans, top button casually undone. Jeez, he looks so freaking hot. My subconscious is frantically fanning herself, and my inner goddess is swaying and writhing to some primal carnal rhythm." -- E.L. James

item.title: Melissa add a quote by E.L. James
item.description: "This is a man in need. His fear is naked and obvious, but he's lost. . . Somewhere in his darkness. His eyes wide and bleak and tortured. I can soothe him. Join him briefly in the darkness and bring him into the light." -- E.L. James

item.title: Melissa add a quote by E.L. James
item.description: "Are you smirking at me, Mr. Grey?” I ask sweetly. Pompous ass." -- E.L. James

item.title: Melissa add a quote by E.L. James
item.description: "Oh, fuck the paperwork" -- E.L. James

item.title: Melissa add a quote by E.L. James
item.description: "I gasp, and I'm Eve in the Garden of Eden, and he's the serpent, and I cannot resist." -- E.L. James

item.title: Melissa add a quote by E.L. James
item.description: "Inside me! I gasp, and all the muscles deep in my belly clench. My inner goddess is doing the dance of the seven veils." -- E.L. James

item.title: Melissa add a quote by E.L. James
item.description: "I'd like to bite that lip." -- E.L. James

item.title: Melissa add a quote by E.L. James
item.description: "I've kissed a prince, Mom. I hope it doesn't turn into a frog." -- E.L. James

item.title: Melissa add a quote by E.L. James
item.description: "Oh...a lot of one and some of the other." -- E.L. James

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Abbi Glines
item.description: "I was taking the bad boy off the market for good." -- Abbi Glines

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Nicole Williams
item.description: "The name’s Jude Ryder, since I know you’re all but salivating like a rabid dog to know, and I don’t do girlfriends, relationships, flowers or regular phone calls. If that works for you, I think we could work out something special." -- Nicole Williams

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Nicole Williams
item.description: "You can’t be friends with the person you were meant to spent your life with" -- Nicole Williams

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Nicole Williams
item.description: "The thing was, if staying away from him made me unsmart, I never wanted to be smart again." -- Nicole Williams

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Tammara Webber
item.description: "Bonus: I now knew what Erin meant by lickable abs." -- Tammara Webber

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Tammara Webber
item.description: "I thought I dreamed you." The words whisper from my parched throat. His head tilts to one side, his mouth shifting to something less sarcastic, more amused. "That may be the most enchanting thing I've ever been told after spending the night with a girl." -- Tammara Webber

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Tammara Webber
item.description: "I suppose love is never a sure thing, no matter what words are spoken. Love requires a leap of faith into the abyss, every time." -- Tammara Webber

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Tammara Webber
item.description: "So when do we get to the junk-kicking?" -- Tammara Webber

item.title: Melissa add a quote by S.C. Stephens
item.description: "If I'm yours and you're mine...then I will take you, wherever and whenever I can." -- S.C. Stephens

item.title: Melissa add a quote by S.C. Stephens
item.description: "He said I was his heart, and you don’t leave your heart behind. You can’t live without your heart." -- S.C. Stephens

item.title: Melissa add a quote by S.C. Stephens
item.description: "His eyes were still closed and his body rocked gently to the music, but his face was almost...desolate. His words matched his face, as he sang about how each day was a struggle, and never seeing my face caused him physical pain. He sang that "my face was his light, and he felt drenched in darkness without it." Tears fell freely after I heard that line." -- S.C. Stephens

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Abbi Glines
item.description: "I was already headed for Hell, I might as well enjoy the ride." -- Abbi Glines

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Abbi Glines
item.description: "no one expected the preacher's daughter to sin, but they sure would love to catch me at it," -- Abbi Glines

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Abbi Glines
Melissa add a quote by Abbi Glines
item.description: "You are such a bad boy." She tugged on the hair that brushed my collar. "I can be real bad. You haven't seen anything yet," I murmured, bending my head so I could take a nip at the soft skin at the back of her neck. "I'm not sure I could keep up with you. I'm extremely inexperienced. We are in completely different planets when it comes to sexual experience," her breathing was labored as I licked and kissed different sweet spots on her shoulders and collarbone. "I didn't say anything about sex, Eva," I grinned before kissing her jawline. "You're the naughty one who brought up sex." -- Abbi Glines
